page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF CRAIG
page.content: Craig is 16 years old , has two brothers called Mike and Russell and a dog called Brek. He lives in {Drumnadrochit. He gets up at 8.30am and has a breakfast of porridge, two slices of toast and a cup of tea. He then walks half a mile down the road to school. At school he is studying the following subjects for his{'0'grades}English, Art, Technical Drawing,Geography and Woodwork. The school day finishes at 3.40pm. When he gets home from school he plays his drums for two hours, before his tea. At nights he either goes to Youth Club, Shinty Training or revises for his '0' grades.His{hobbies are Fishing, Music and Poaching. He is hoping to be an Electrician when he leaves school in June 1985.
